name: Ghost of the Ark
description:
Based on the theme - 'Ghost of the ARK'

Space: Toggle flashlight (spiders come at you with flashlight on)
WASD: Move

Make it to the end of each level!

3D AssetsSamuel, ElijahProgrammersGaurav, JoshArt DesignerOna

Warning : Not suitable for people suffering from Photosensitive epilepsy.

Additional: Trap models from Unity Store, music from SoundBible.com
